member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT
member.summary: Defines the vertical alignment settings for content within the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT_NONE
member.summary: No alignment. The object can be positioned anywhere within the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT_TOP
member.summary: Align object along the top of the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT_CENTER
member.summary: Align object to the center of the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT_BOTTOM
member.summary: Align object along the bottom of the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_VERTICALALIGNMENT_UNLOCKCENTER
member.summary: Content zooms around the center point of the contacts, instead of being locked with the vertical alignment.
